TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed InstrumentationManager extends System.Object

Docs.summary:
Provides methods that manage the lifetime and the model used for decoupled providers.
Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries. The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Publish(object value) cil managed

Docs.param: An instance of the class that implements the provider to publish.
Docs.summary: Makes an instance of a provider available within the WMI infrastructure.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void RegisterAssembly(class System.Reflection.Assembly managementAssembly) cil managed

Docs.summary: Registers an assembly with the WMI infrastructure.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void RegisterType(class System.Type managementType) cil managed

Docs.summary: Registers a class with the WMI infrastructure.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Revoke(object value) cil managed

Docs.param: An instance of the class that implements the provider to revoke.
Docs.summary: Takes an instance of a currently available provider and makes it unavailable within the WMI infrastructure.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void UnregisterAssembly(class System.Reflection.Assembly managementAssembly) cil managed

Docs.summary: Unregisters an assembly currently registered with the WMI infrastructure.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void UnregisterType(class System.Type managementType) cil managed

Docs.summary: Unregisters a class registered with the WMI infrastructure.
